thread.section_title: The Westin New York at Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing city hotel
thread.title_full: Amazing city hotel - Review of The Westin New York at Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: ReanC
title: Amazing city hotel
text:
We picked Westin for its location and were not disappointed. It is diagonally across the bus terminal if you are taking a bus shuttle to the Woodsbury premium outlet. It is very close to Time Square, H&M, Shake Shack and the Broadway theatres.
The rooms are quite spacious and came with complimentary Starbucks coffee packs. Wifi was strong too - remember to sign up for your free SPG account to get free wifi.
As I stayed during St Patrick's day there was some merry making and music at the Irish pubs downstairs but it didn't bother me. We had dinner at the Foundry and the food quality was good.
It was a good stay and I hope to be back.
